document.full_text: the effort to protect river towns in illinois and kentucky from rising floodwaters by blowing open a levee and inundating more than 100,000 acres of missouri farmland appeared to be slowly working on tuesday.
document.title: levee detonation lowers river, triggers new lawsuit
lines_and_colors: the effort to protect river towns in illinois and kentucky from rising floodwaters by blowing open a levee and inundating more than 100,000 acres of missouri farmland appeared to be slowly working on tuesday.
